fantomas.indent.description: Set number of spaces for indentation (default = 4). The value should be between 1 and 10.

fantomas.pageWidth.description: Set the column where we break to new lines (default = 80). The value should be at least 60.

fantomas.semicolonEOL.description: Enable semicolons at the end of line (default = false).

fantomas.noSpaceBeforeArgument.description: Disable spaces before the first argument of functions when there are parenthesis (default = true). For methods and constructors, there are never spaces regardless of this option.

fantomas.indentOnTryWith.description: Enable indentation on try/with block (default = false).

fantomas.noSpaceAroundDelimiter.description: Disable spaces after starting and before ending of lists, arrays, sequences and records (default = true).

fantomas.keepNewlineAfter.description: Keep newlines found after = in let bindings, -> in pattern matching and chained function calls (default = false).

fantomas.maxIfThenElseShortWidth.description: Set the max length of any expression in an if expression before formatting on multiple lines (default = 40).

fantomas.strictMode.description: Enable strict mode (ignoring directives and comments and printing literals in canonical forms) (default = false).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
